content.title: Goals of the Project
content.question: At the kickstart meeting, we defined the most relevant goals of the project. In your opinion, did they were achieve?

content.title: Project's satisfaction
content.question: How do you estimate your satisfaction with the project so far?

content.title: Work Aspects
content.question: How do you feel about the next aspects of our job?

content.title: Added Value
content.question: What has aggregated more value to the project from our job?

content.title: Possible Improvements
content.question: is it there any aspect of the project that you think it should have been improved?

content.title: Personal Opinion
content.question: If somebody ask you about our job or references from Multiplica, what would you say?

content.title: Recommendation
content.question: From 1 to 10... How likely is that you recommend us?
